name: TVShowTrivia
0:
”Alexa, open tv show trivia”
”Alexa, start tv show trivia”
”Alexa, launch tv show trivia”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: t. v. show trivia
Developer Terms of Use
des:
"TV Show Trivia" is an Alexa Skill Game designed to test your knowledge of classic, modern, and nostalgic TV shows.
Users answer trivia questions with a simple "yes" or "no" and earn points for every correct response. After every set of questions, Alexa will announce your score, making it fun and competitive!

💥 SINGLE PLAYER MODE 💥

• Answer TV-themed questions with "yes" or "no."
• Earn points: Gain 1 point for every correct answer.
• Check your score: Say "stop" anytime to hear your accumulated points.
• Score updates: After every 10 questions, Alexa will announce your total score.

💥 MULTIPLAYER MODE 💥

• Compete with friends and family! Up to 4 players can join in on the fun.
• Scores revealed: After every 20 questions, players’ scores will be announced to reveal the leaderboard.
• Correct Answer Explanations: When you answer incorrectly, Alexa provides an explanation of the correct answer to expand your knowledge.
• Repeat Feature: Missed a question? Simply say “repeat,” and Alexa will repeat the question for you.


Challenge your loved ones to see who knows the most about TV shows, from classic series to modern hits!
Get ready to relive TV history and crown the ultimate trivia champion!

💥 HAVE FUN! 💥
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
